title: Pixel 3: Google earbuds, how do I disable notification sounds when I'm using them?
content: When I use the earphones that came with the pixel 3 I can't turn the notification volume down, even if the phone's silent (so without earphones it would not make a single sound) when I have them on and listening to music or watching videos the notifications make sounds and calls make sounds and I can't turn it down.. Hopefully I was clear.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
